title: How many of you would listen to a weekly/Bi-weekly Radio show about E-Sports?
body:
There is a local radio station out of my town that does podcasting and stuff. If I got approval from them I would want to do a monthly, weekly, bi-weekly hour-two hour show on the state of E-sports. Would mostly be League but Would throw in some SC2, CS:Go Etc. 

Before I go towards their commitee I want to know if there would be any interest 

Thanks

P.S If anyone from Riot reads this and would have any idea if Riot would be interested in showing some support for this; Give me a buzz :)

replies.body:
"Local"

You might want to define this.
Wow. This is how often I check the forums lol! Local as in Victoria Port Phillip area. But it is downloadable via their website or something... I dont know... I need to get more information on it.

There is a Radio show about E-Sports??

-GL,HF
On the internet yeah! But this is a RADIO station.
